MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: The change log can be found at https://github.com/meerkatzenwildschein/jeboorker/releases

English.Keywords: ebook, management, catalog, converter, metadata, editor
English.Char_Desc_80: Ebook management software which can be merged with an existing ebook collection
English.Char_Desc_250: Jeboorker is an ebook management software which can be merged with an existing ebook folder structure. It provides an user interface that allows to search or change the ebook meta data. Jeboorker supports epub, cbr, cbz and pdf documents without DRM
English.Char_Desc_450: Jeboorker is an ebook management software which can be merged with an existing ebook folder structure. It provides an user interface that allows to search or change the ebook meta data. Jeboorker supports epub, cbr, cbz and pdf documents without DRM so far.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Jeboorker is an ebook management software which can be merged with an existing ebook folder structure. It provides an user interface that allows to search or change the ebook meta data. Jeboorker supports epub, cbr, cbz, mobi, azw and pdf documents without DRM so far.
